about_the_game:
Tower Defense game - where you build units to destroy incoming waves of monsters or....not succeed trying :)

Demo supports 4 levels, around 30+- minutes gameplay, main game continues from same progression save.
detailed_description:
Tower Defense game - where you build units to destroy incoming waves of monsters or....not succeed trying :)

Demo supports 4 levels, around 30+- minutes gameplay, main game continues from same progression save.
name: Conspiracy TD Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 710
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel I5-3470
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Tower Defense game - where you build units to destroy incoming waves of monsters or....not succeed trying :)Demo supports 4 levels, around 30+- minutes gameplay, main game continues from same progression save.
